Name: Skyward Blade
Title: Sky-Piercing: Skyward Blade
Desc: The sky-piercing fang. With nemesis vanquished, the wind dragon fell into a deep slumber.\nCenturies passed, and Dvalin's sacrifice was all but forgotten by Mondstadt.\nA prayer, this sword is. May Dvalin's name be restored.

Talent.Name: Skyward Blade
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once per Round:</color> This character's <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 additional DMG.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3205}Sword Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
